title: PROJECT COMPLETED: SNSF Grant 205487
description: Successfully concluded the 3-year SNSF-funded research on network-based credit risk models. 12 Zenodo deposits, 2 PhD researchers trained, CHF 387,836 total funding.

title: New Publication in Expert Systems with Applications
description: A related paper 'Leveraging network topology for credit risk assessment in P2P lending' has been published in Expert Systems with Applications.

title: Publication in Finance Research Letters
description: A related paper 'Network centrality and credit risk: A comprehensive analysis of peer-to-peer lending dynamics' has been published.

title: SNSF Mobility Grants Awarded
description: Two SNSF mobility grants (20,000 CHF each) awarded for research exchange between Bern and partner institutions.

title: COST Conference Presentation
description: Team presented 'Predicting Loan Default in P2P lending: A Comparative Analysis' at the 8th European COST Conference on AI in Finance in Bern.
